title: Redacted Intel
description: Remove classified words from the document.
objective: Delete the extra words to match the target, then save.
quote:
Sometimes information must be removed,
not added.

Learn to delete efficiently.
One command can do the work of many.
victory_quote:
Document redacted successfully.
Classified information secured.

You're becoming quite the editor.
lore:
This message contains sensitive information
that must be removed before transmission.

Deleting character by character with 'x' is slow.
Use 'dw' to delete entire words at once.

Position your cursor and strike efficiently.
